text: The National Football League 100th Anniversary All-Time Team was voted on by media members, former players and league employees in 2019. It chose the greatest players of the first 100 years of the National Football League (NFL). ==All-Time Team== ===Offense=== Sources:NFL's All-Time Team: Tom Brady, Joe Montana top quarterbacksJoe Montana first quarterback named to All-Time TeamPatriots QB Tom Brady named to NFL All-Time TeamNFL's All-Time Team: Tight ends, offensive linemen revealedRandy Moss first WR named to NFL 100 All-Time
